content: the country comfort mitten pattern gives you a very warm and super comfy pair of chunky mittens using loops and threads country loom yarn this pattern will require one full skein of country loom yarn and a j 6 00mm hook to get correct sizing the gauge using the j hook is as follows in a 2 x2 stitch area you should have approximately 5 5 single_crochet stitches and 5 row adjust hook size to meet proper gauge the use of a stitch marker is helpful to mark your starting stitch in the round **note you can also use lion brand wool-ease thick & quick yarn in this pattern you ll need 2 skeins of yarn and you ll need to use a k hook to maintain the same sizing the gauge you ll need to meet when using this yarn is that within a 2 x2 area you should get 5 single_crochet s across & 6 row** the instructions outline making right and left mittens and give some tips on how to either add length or shorten the mittens for a more personalized fit the finished mittens measure approximately 9 from top of the mitten to the bottom of cuff and they measure approximately 4 across thank you for stopping by my listing i hope you enjoy the pattern stacey in stitches
